underlying_goal: Refactor shell prompt components to use a shared, consistent script for displaying the machine name in SSH sessions.
primary_success: Proactively identifying the duplicated logic and proposing a clean refactoring into a shared, reusable script in `custom_bins/`.
brief_summary: The user asked to update a statusline script to show the machine name. Claude implemented it, then upon user feedback, refactored the duplicated logic from both the statusline and p10k configs into a new shared script, `custom_bins/machine-name`, improving maintainability.
